summary: Flexible Accountant who adapts seamlessly to constantly evolving accounting processes and technology. Adept at budget forecasting, financial reporting and corporate tax planning.

experience.title: Head of Accounts and Finance
experience.description: Account operations lead responsible for the production of monthly financial reports, maintenance of accounting records, and a comprehensive set of controls and budgets designed to mitigate risk and ensure compliance with GAAP/IFRS. Oversaw accounting department operations across branches, managed outsourced functions, and maintained the PPE register. Responsible for accounts payable/receivable, payroll processing, bank reconciliations, debt payments, chart of accounts, and filing system. Led preparation of annual corporate report, financial statements, and budgeting processes; coordinated with external auditors and government authorities; supported capital investments and financial analysis.

experience.title: Senior Accountant
experience.description: Managed coffee and cocoa books across branches, reported program expenses and budgets to directors, and oversaw project finances and cash flow. Processed payments, prepared payroll, performed bank reconciliations, and handled intercompany reconciliations. Monitored VAT, prepared cash flow reports, conducted stock valuation, and supported external audits and TRA inquiries. Maintained fixed assets, depreciation, and asset registers; contributed to financial reporting and compliance activities.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Maintained staff imprest records and loans, reconciled debtors and creditors, and performed monthly bank reconciliations. Calculated VAT, maintained fixed assets register and depreciation, prepared sales performance reports, and managed treasury transfers between main accounts and banks. Processed expense vouchers, posted transactions, and handled advertisement transactions and related reconciliations.

experience.title: Trainee
experience.description: Prepared payments, regular reports on revenue and expenditure, reconciled direct debits, prepared invoices, performed bank reconciliations, disbursed cash and cheque payments, posted transactions in computerized accounting systems, and reconciled debtors and creditors records.
